message.name: INF_DEFERRED_PROC_CASE_FAILED
message.locale: Delayed Processing for Case %1s encountered an unrecoverable error.

message.name: INF_DEFERRED_PROC_CASE_FAILED_REASON
message.locale: The delayed processing operation %1s, which %2s. Encountered an error while acting on this case, the details of this error have been written to the system logs, please contact your system administrator.

message.name: INF_DEFERRED_PROC_FAILED
message.locale: Delayed Processing encountered an unrecoverable error.

message.name: INF_DEFERRED_PROC_FAILED_REASON
message.locale: The delayed processing operation %1s, which %2s. Encountered an error, the details of this error have been written to the system logs, please contact your system administrator.

message.name: INF_TICKET_DUEDATE_PASSED_REASON
message.locale: Task %1s, owned by %2s has passed it's due date.
